mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lee informs Thomas of his change of address as he maintains his leave in Arlington, Va. There are three more letters (dated April, May, and June)to Thomas within Washington and Lee's holdings, all maintaining the change of address as Arlington. These letters are not provided in the database.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: United States. Army -- Leaves and furloughs
United States. Army -- Officers -- Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter to Colonel S. Thomas, January 1, 1859 (correspondence)
